name: Troy Riberon
body:
### About Me
I am a software developer from Atlanta, GA living in Melbourne, Australia. I am interested in computer security, keelboat sailing, craft beer, cocktails, and wine.

[@riberon](https://twitter.com/riberon)  
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/troyriberon)
